meta.content: Welcome to the Home of Washington Leadership Academy: High School of the Future! Our mission is to prepare students with the knowledge, skills and habits required for success in college and lives of public leadership.

p.strong: The results are in! Congratulations to our incredible team of staff and students - we are rated
by the D.C. Public Charter School Board and 4-STARS by OSSE!

div.p: At Washington Leadership Academy, we prepare our kids to thrive in the world and change it for the better. WLA graduates are college-ready, have career-ready tech skills, and lead positive change in their communities and the world.
WLA is a free, open-enrollment, non-selective public charter high school in the heart of Washington, D.C. We are proud to be one of the first ten XQ Super Schools in the U.S.!
We share our school development materials and lessons learned openly. You can access them here.

div.span: College prep academics with a computer science focus

article.p: Meet the Students and Teachers of WLA

a.h3: Add Yourself to the Waiting List

div.p: WLA is a free, open enrollment, non-selective, public charter high school that participates in the MySchoolDC public school lottery system. Add yourself to our waiting list at MySchoolDC.org.

div.h3: At WLA, we’re leading the country in college prep and computer science instruction

a.h3: We’re always looking for outstanding teachers!

div.p: Join our team of Army Captains, Award-Winning Teach for America Alumni, technologists, and more.
div.a: Apply to Join Our High Performing team

article.p: See the Future. Be the Future.
